Author: TwilightPunkster K64#7533
Content: Would it be an idea to have a "stackoverflow" like webapp, that instead of reputation bounties, does kmd bounties? I love discord, but it is time to move forward as a community, accelerate development, bug tracking, etc. This might also be good for ecosystems (like our Gaming SDK, Agama Wallet, CC's, etc.). It's fairly simple to use Discord OAuth for it. I am not talking about another discussion forum, but for example, there is an issue found that isn't like severe in GH, but could be bountified.
